data.title: Star Wars Episode Adventures by Wolverton Dave
data.meta_description: The Ghostling Children (Star Wars Adventures Episode 1) by Dave Wolverton and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Condition: Good. SHIPS FROM USA. Used books have different signs of use and do not include supplemental materials such as CDs, Dvds, Access Codes, charts or any other extra material. All used books might have various degrees of writing, highliting and wear and tear and possibly be an ex-library with the usual stickers and stamps. Dust Jackets are not guaranteed and when still present, they will have various degrees of tear and damage. All images are Stock Photos, not of the actual item. book.

Soft cover. Condition: New. 1st Printing. Hard to find Star Wars Game book, published by Scholastic. This edition only available for distribution through the school market. Conditiion is new, with slight edgewear, appears unread.*We have other titles in this genre in stock and give discounts in shipping on additional books sent in the same package, please contact us for more info.**.WRAPPED IN PLASTIC BAG TO PROTECT CONDITION OF BOOK.Summary - The Ghostling children live on a beautiful, isolated world, safe from harm.until they are captured by an evil trader. Soon they find themselves on the harsh planet of Tatooine, about to be sold to the terrifying Gardulla the Hutt.You are their only hope. You must break into Gardulla's fortress and free them.Can you save the Ghostlings?.

Soft cover. Condition: Very Good Plus. Not Listed. Hard to find Star Wars Game book, published by Scholastic. This edition only available for distribution through the school market. Condition is very good plus, multiple handling creases on cover, large crease across front cover,slight edgewear, some corners bumped or creased and top corners and center edge of some pages dented.*We have other titles in this genre in stock and give discounts in shipping on additional books sent in the same package, please contact us for more info.**.WRAPPED IN PLASTIC BAG TO PROTECT CONDITION OF BOOK.Summary - Anakin Skywalker and his friends have helped to free a group of Ghostling slaves. Now their owner, Gardulla the Hutt, wants to find who's responsible. And the Hutt wants revenge.Your assignment: to track down Anakin Skywalker and bring him back to Gardulla.Can you find him?.Can you save him?.

Soft cover. Condition: New. 1st Printing. Stars Wars game book paperback, Condition is new.*We have other titles in this genre in stock and give discounts in shipping on additional books sent in the same package, please contact us for more info.**.WRAPPED IN PLASTIC BAG TO PROTECT CONDITION OF BOOK.Summary - Jabba the Hutt has a mission for you. Princess Arawynne and the rest of the Ghostling children are missing. They have been hidden, and Jabba wants them back. . . at any cost.You heard to Gardulla the Hutt's pleasure garden to track the slaves down. Be careful! Arawynne and her friends aren't going to be captured without a fight . . .
